panels.description:
Угол возвышение  спутников во времени, усреднённый за минуту, без возможности отфильтровать спутники.

Предназначен для быстрого обзор и поиска интересующего временного интервала.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('', sat), elevation)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, ($interval * 1000)) * ($interval * 1000)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(elevation) elevation
    FROM computed.satxyz2

    WHERE
        $timeFilterMs

    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('', sat), elevation)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, (60 * 1000)) * (60 * 1000)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(elevation) elevation
    FROM computed.satxyz2

    WHERE
        "d" >= toDate(1717750449) AND "d" <= toDate(1717836849) AND time >= toUInt64(1717750449858/1000 * 1000) AND time <= toUInt64(1717836849860/1000 * 1000)

    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

panels.title: Видимость спутников

panels.description: Усреднённое за минуту количество видимых спутников.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    time t,
    groupArray(('count', cnt)) AS groupArr

FROM
(
    SELECT
        time,
        count(DISTINCT *) as cnt

    FROM
      (
      SELECT
          d,
          (intDiv(time, (60000)) * (60000)) AS time,
          sat

      FROM
          computed.satxyz2

      GROUP BY
          d,
          time,
          sat

      ORDER BY
          d,
          time,
          sat
    )
    WHERE
        $timeFilterMs

    GROUP BY
        time

    ORDER BY
        time ASC
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    time t,
    groupArray(('count', cnt)) AS groupArr

FROM
(
    SELECT
        time,
        count(DISTINCT *) as cnt

    FROM
      (
      SELECT
          d,
          (intDiv(time, (60000)) * (60000)) AS time,
          sat

      FROM
          computed.satxyz2

      GROUP BY
          d,
          time,
          sat

      ORDER BY
          d,
          time,
          sat
    )
    WHERE
        "d" >= toDate(1717750422) AND "d" <= toDate(1717836822) AND time >= toUInt64(1717750422481/1000 * 1000) AND time <= toUInt64(1717836822481/1000 * 1000)

    GROUP BY
        time

    ORDER BY
        time ASC
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

panels.title: Количество видимых спутников

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Computed TEC ', sat, ' ', sigcomb), nt)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, ($interval * 100)) *($interval * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        sigcomb,
        avg(nt) nt
    FROM computed.NT final

    WHERE
        $timeFilterMs
        AND sat IN ($satellite)
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat,
        sigcomb
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Computed TEC ', sat, ' ', sigcomb), nt)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, (50 * 100)) *(50 * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        sigcomb,
        avg(nt) nt
    FROM computed.NT final

    WHERE
        "d" >= toDate(1717825836) AND "d" <= toDate(1717836636) AND time >= toUInt64(1717825836674/1000 * 1000) AND time <= toUInt64(1717836636674/1000 * 1000)
        AND sat IN ('GLONASS2','GLONASS3','GPS5','GPS11','GPS12','GLONASS14','GLONASS15','GLONASS16','GPS16','GLONASS17','GLONASS18','GPS18','GPS20','GPS23','GLONASS24','GPS25','GPS26','GPS28','GPS29')
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat,
        sigcomb
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Raw TEC ', sat, ' ', primaryfreq, '+', secondaryfreq), tec)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, ($interval * 100)) *($interval * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(tec) tec,
        primaryfreq,
        secondaryfreq
    FROM computed.ismrawtec

    WHERE
        $timeFilterMs
        AND sat IN ($satellite)
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat,
        primaryfreq,
        secondaryfreq
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Raw TEC ', sat, ' ', primaryfreq, '+', secondaryfreq), tec)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, (50 * 100)) *(50 * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(tec) tec,
        primaryfreq,
        secondaryfreq
    FROM computed.ismrawtec

    WHERE
        "d" >= toDate(1717825836) AND "d" <= toDate(1717836636) AND time >= toUInt64(1717825836674/1000 * 1000) AND time <= toUInt64(1717836636674/1000 * 1000)
        AND sat IN ('GLONASS2','GLONASS3','GPS5','GPS11','GPS12','GLONASS14','GLONASS15','GLONASS16','GPS16','GLONASS17','GLONASS18','GPS18','GPS20','GPS23','GLONASS24','GPS25','GPS26','GPS28','GPS29')
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat,
        primaryfreq,
        secondaryfreq
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Elevation ', sat), elevation)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, ($interval * 100)) *($interval * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(elevation) elevation
    FROM computed.satxyz2

    WHERE
        $timeFilterMs
        AND sat IN ($satellite)
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    t,
    groupArray((concat('Elevation ', sat), elevation)) AS groupArr
FROM
(
    SELECT
        (intDiv(time, (50 * 100)) *(50 * 100)) AS t,
        sat,
        avg(elevation) elevation
    FROM computed.satxyz2

    WHERE
        "d" >= toDate(1717825836) AND "d" <= toDate(1717836636) AND time >= toUInt64(1717825836674/1000 * 1000) AND time <= toUInt64(1717836636674/1000 * 1000)
        AND sat IN ('GLONASS2','GLONASS3','GPS5','GPS11','GPS12','GLONASS14','GLONASS15','GLONASS16','GPS16','GLONASS17','GLONASS18','GPS18','GPS20','GPS23','GLONASS24','GPS25','GPS26','GPS28','GPS29')
    GROUP BY
        t,
        sat
    ORDER BY
        t,
        sat
)
GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

list.definition: select distinct(sat) from computed.NT where time between $__from and $__to
list.name: satellite
list.query: select distinct(sat) from computed.NT where time between $__from and $__to
